product.name: CoverGirl Lip Perfection Lipliner
product.description:
High conditioning lip liner. Created to work perfectly with Lip 
Perfection Lipstick, CoverGirl's lip liner formula contains over 60% skin 
conditioners, so you can line and define with conditioning colour.Features: Shades pair perfectly with Lip Perfection LipstickContains Vitamin EPencil requires sharpener
